alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued July 01 at 5:01PM MST until July 01 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 600 PM MST. * At 500 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 13 miles west of Chui-Chu to near Coolidge to 11 miles west of Kearny, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 172 and 197. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 152 and 176. US Highway 60 between mile markers 208 and 215. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Florence, Coolidge, Maricopa, Queen Creek, San Tan Valley, Florence Junction, Queen Valley, Bapchule, Olberg and Arizola. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
